GOLDBERG--Lisa. On behalf of the entire faculty of New York University, we extend deepest condolences to the family of Lisa Goldberg, cherished wife of our University President, John Sexton. We join her colleagues and many friends in being profoundly saddened by this sudden, and untimely loss. The Faculty Senators Council of New York University
